value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I had heard this gloomy wood was
home to wandering shades—Heroes
seeking that which they have lost...$k$pThe rumors had said it was cold, but
this is more than even I was prepared
for...the chill is different from Nifl's.$k$pIt's as if the cold here is enough to
freeze your heart in your ches—
Wait...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Who's there?!$k$p$WmMPID_魔剣マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Dark,Face|Don't try to run...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-is that you, Mareeta?!$k$p$WmMPID_魔剣マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Dark,Face|...Die!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Uwah! Mareeta! What are y— Aah!
You're going to ki— Uagh!$k$p$WmMPID_魔剣マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Dark,Face|I... Unngh... Ah! Oh no!$k$pPrincess Fjorm... You shouldn't be—
Leave...now...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Mareeta?! Wh-what is happening?$k$p$WmMPID_催眠チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Dark,Face|...Why are you here?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Huh? I-is it you, Tiki?$k$p$WmMPID_催眠チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Dark,Face|Is this...a dream? Am I...are we in
the fane?$k$pThose who defile the sanctuary...
will become ash...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Tiki, it's me, Fjorm! There's no need
to— Aagh!$k$p*pant* *pant* What is...going on...
in these woods?$k$p$WmMPID_暴走カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Dark,Face|Princess Fjorm! This way!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Corrin?! Where did y—
Oh, never mind that! I am just happy
to see a friendly face...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_暴走カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Dark,Face|$Fi1500|All right... We put some distance
between us, so we should be safe
here for now.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Whew... Can you... What happened to
those two?!$k$p$WmMPID_暴走カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Dark,Face|They are not the Mareeta and Tiki
you know.$k$p...Just as I am not the Corrin you
know.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_暴走カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Dark,Face|I mean, if you can avoid entering
these woods...you should. I can't—
Hrrgh...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Corrin?! Y-you're dripping
with sweat! Are you ill?$k$p$WmMPID_暴走カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Dark,Face|Please... Do not worry over me...
Just...run... Flee this place!$k$p$WmMPID_闇ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dark,Face|You would do well to listen to her.
Even among the others in these
woods, she...is the true monster.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah! Prince Berkut! Wh-what do
you mean by that?$k$p$WmMPID_闇ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dark,Face|You've been warned, Princess. Not
all Heroes are blessed. You would be
wise to remember that.$k$p
